errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.

budget.donate: 🚨 OpenAI charges about $0.005 per answer. The website owner sometimes tops up from their own pocket, but it is not enough (currently about 30,000 users/month). So please top up on your own - the process has been automated. 🙏

requestSummary: So far you've made {{requestsNum}} request(s), which costs around ${{costUSD}} (≈ {{costUAH}}₴).
topUpQuestion: Did you replenish the site budget?
